scepter_desc: After casting Blink, your next Mana Break within 5s burns an additional 20% max mana and prevents the target from regenerating or gaining mana for a short duration. This debuff is undispellable. Blink Cooldown reduced by 1s.
shard_desc: Creates a blinked fragment of Anti-Mage next to the enemy caster upon reflecting their unit-targeted spell while active.

scepter_desc: Counter Helix now applies a stacking debuff to enemies hit by it that causes them to deal less total attack damage to Axe. Counter Helix no longer has a cooldown and its counter advances when Axe attacks.
shard_desc: Multiple instances of Battle Hunger can stack on a single target.

scepter_desc: Reduces Fiend's Grip cooldown by 45. Fiend's Grip now creates two uncontrollable illusions that are also channeling Fiend's Grip on the target. Illusions take 225% incoming damage and immediately die if they are interrupted. Damage does not stack.
shard_desc: Reduces cooldown by 3. Causes Brain Sap to become a 550 AoE spell. Secondary targets only heal for 30%.

scepter_desc: Increases initial damage and grants 2 Rupture Charges.
shard_desc: Bloodseeker's Bloodrage attacks now deal 2% of the target's max health as <font color="#d8ae53">Pure</font> damage.

scepter_desc: Allows you to move, cast and attack during Freezing Field. Can still be interrupted by enemies. You move 75% slower during this. Increases total number of explosions by 20%. Applies Frostbite to any unit that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over 2s.
shard_desc: Slides in a direction, creating a crystal clone of herself in her place and disjointing incoming projectiles. If the clone takes enough damage or times out, it shatters, Frostbiting enemies in a 450 AoE around its place. The Clone can also be destroyed by Crystal Maiden's own spells.

scepter_desc: Frost Arrows now apply a Hypothermia stack to enemies, increasing damage from Frost Arrows and reducing their regeneration per stack. If an enemy dies with Hypothermia stacks, they burst and deal damage per stack and slow in an area around it.
shard_desc: Drow creates a hill of ice beneath her. While standing on the hill, attackers gain bonus attack range and high ground advantage - they cannot miss and gain flying vision. Drow additionally gets bonus Multishot arrows per wave while on the hill. The front of the hill obscures vision and cannot be moved through except by Drow. Does not interrupt Multishot when cast.

scepter_desc: Enchant Totem becomes a ground target ability, causing Earthshaker to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting Enchant Totem there.  Self-casting the ability will behave in the original form, without jumping. Grants Enchant Totem a cleaving attack.
shard_desc: Reduces Fissure cooldown and releases an Aftershock along its path that stuns for a shortened duration when Earthshaker casts another ability.

scepter_desc: Performs a short Omnislash for 1 seconds.
shard_desc: Increases Blade Fury radius, and slows enemies by 35%.

scepter_desc: Causes Sacred Arrow to release a Starstorm on enemies along the travel path of the primary arrow, releasing a second Starstorm that deals less damage to the impacted unit.
shard_desc: Grants +1 Leap charge. Attacks during the Leap buff critically strike for 150% damage.

scepter_desc: Adds an alt-cast to Morph. When enabled, a strong illusion is created of the target hero that can cast all of the hero's basic abilities. If the illusion is alive when Morphling toggles the ability, he will take the place of the illusion, destroying it.
shard_desc: Morphling can shift attributes while stunned. Reduces mana cost.

scepter_desc: Increases max souls.
shard_desc: Cooldown reduced by 2s per enemy hero.

scepter_desc: Increases Range. Whenever Phantom Lancer Rushes through enemies, he creates Juxtapose illusions that attack them. Additionally, every 600 units rushed creates a Juxtapose illusion that rushes to the target alongside Phantom Lancer.
shard_desc: Adds an active ability to Juxtapose. Renders Phantom Lancer invisible for up to 8 seconds while generating a duplicate image to confuse enemies. His movement speed is increased by 15% during this invisibility.

scepter_desc: All enemies affected by Dream Coil are attacked at a rate equal to 90% of Puck's attack rate. The attacks continue while the target is stunned if they break the Dream Coil.
shard_desc: Puck's attacks deal bonus magic damage. Puck attacks all enemies within its attack range every time it phase shifts.

scepter_desc: Increases Rot radius and damage, and causes it to reduce enemy Health Restoration.
shard_desc:
When Meat Hook hits an enemy, it deals bonus damage based on the distance pulled.

When Meat Hook hits an ally, Meat Hook's cooldown is reduced by 50%.

scepter_desc: Causes Eye of the Storm to strike two different units instead of one and can damage structures. When striking buildings, it will only target towers, barracks, and the Ancient.
shard_desc: Increases Cast Range. Slows Razor's target by 1x the amount of damage stolen while the link is active.

scepter_desc: When the pulses start, 3 Stinger attack areas are created every =0.5s at random locations, each measuring 35% of the Epicenter's current radius, that apply =50% of Stinger damage to enemies hit. Shard pulses cause 1 attack(s).
shard_desc: Increases Epicenter damage per pulse. Every 3s causes a small single Epicenter Pulse around Sand King.

scepter_desc: Electric Vortex affects all enemies within a radius around Storm Spirit.
shard_desc: Can be activated to grant Storm Spirit and nearby allied heroes 3 Overload charges. Provides bonus Attack Speed. Lasts up to 12 seconds or until the charges are depleted.

scepter_desc: Increases cast range, projectile speed and applies a basic dispel to affected enemies. Allows Storm Hammer to affect invulnerable enemies in the radius. If alt-cast, it deals an additional 180 damage and Sven travels with the Storm Hammer.
shard_desc: Warcry is now undispellable and passively grants 6 armor to all allies near Sven. Increases active movement speed bonus.

scepter_desc: CHANNELED - Tiny channels to throw random trees within range towards the targeted area. Deals Tiny's attack damage to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.
shard_desc: Increases damage dealt by thrown trees by %bonus_bonus_damage%.

scepter_desc: Upon death, creates a strong illusion of Vengeful Spirit that deals full damage, takes increased damage, and can cast all of her spells. If the illusion is alive when Vengeful Spirit respawn, she will take its place. XP earned by her illusion is given to her. Strong Illusions are not instantly killed by spells.
shard_desc: Bounces once on an enemy, prioritizing heroes, within 75% of Magic Missile's current cast range from the first target.

scepter_desc: Windrun reduces physical damage taken by 45%, and grants invisibility that is not broken by attacking or casting spells.
shard_desc: Vector Targeted. Summons a strong wind that pushes all enemies in the target area towards the target direction.

scepter_desc: Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.
shard_desc: Zeus gains bonus attack speed and his attacks create Arc Lightnings that deal a percentage of its damage. Can be toggled off to stop this effect.

scepter_desc: Ghostship creates a fleet of 2 ships at the target point on a 2.5 second interval. Each ship now also fires 3 waves of cannonballs from the port and starboard side that deal 40% of Ghostship's damage as they pass through enemies.
shard_desc: Releases a Tidal Wave that spawns behind Kunkka. Deals damage and drags enemies along it. Enemies cannot attack while being dragged.

scepter_desc: Grants Lina unobstructed movement and increases her spell damage and magic resistance. Grants max fiery soul stacks on activation.
shard_desc: 100% of the damage dealt is converted to an all damage barrier for Lina. Barrier lasts for 10s.

scepter_desc: Increases damage. Decreases cooldown. Finger of Death hits all units in a small area.
shard_desc: Causes Mana Drain to affect up to 2 additional enemies and increases break distance. Lion becomes Debuff Immune with 60% magic resistance while channeling.

scepter_desc: Increase cast range. Every 0.9 seconds, shackled units emit a radial Ether Shock hitting all other units within 600 of the target for 100% of Ether Shock's normal damage. Shackles can now also be cast on allies and Mass Serpent Wards that stay within 2000 units of Shadow Shaman. Allied units are not disabled by Shackle.
shard_desc: Increases the amount of time incoming damage is reduced to 1.5 seconds. When Fowl Play is triggered, Shadow Shaman becomes invulnerable for .1 seconds and 3 additional uncontrollable chickens are created that last for 3 seconds. While Shadow Shaman is transformed, he can now use items.

scepter_desc: Provides additional HP Regen, Armor and Status Resistance while in a puddle, trail, or river. Increases puddle/trail radius by 75 and puddle/trail duration by 5s.
shard_desc: Slithereen Crush now applies Corrosive Haze for a short time to units affected.

scepter_desc: Gush becomes a ground targeted wave ability that affects enemy units in a line.  Decreases cooldown.
shard_desc: Tidehunter attaches a heavy anchor to an enemy hero. The hero is leashed while attached to the anchor. Attempting to move more than 350 units away from the anchor forces the hero to 100 move speed, dragging the anchor behind them. The anchor can be destroyed with 4 hero attacks.

scepter_desc: Death Ward attacks bounce between nearby enemies.
shard_desc: Turns Witch Doctor into a Death Ward briefly with reduced attack speed. He is hidden during this time.

scepter_desc: Sinister Gaze becomes an Area of Effect ability, affecting units within a radius of 400 in the target area. Sinister Gaze allows Lich to cast other abilities while channeling it.
shard_desc:
Creates an Ice Spire at the target spot, slowing enemies around it. Can take 4 hero hits or 8 creep hits and when destroyed it will create a Frost Blast around it.

Chain Frost can be cast on the Spire and can bounce to the Spire and damage the spire by 1 hero attack if there are no other enemies in range.

Lich can cast Frost Shield on the Spire. Each Frost Shield tick will heal the spire by 1 hero attack.

scepter_desc: Increases Cast Range. Allows you to target an allied unit, hiding inside them for the duration. While hiding in an allied unit, they have 15% bonus movement speed, and Tricks of the Trade lasts 1s longer and does an additional 2 attacks.
shard_desc: Enemies caught in the smoke screen have their armor reduced by 5 and cannot be targeted by their allies.

scepter_desc: Black Hole deals additional damage equivalent to 4% of the unit's Max Health per second and does a non-interrupting pull towards it in a 1200 AoE. Pulls at a rate of 175.
shard_desc: Increases Malefice stun duration by 0.30s and creates an Eidolon next to the target every instance of Malefice stun. These Eidolons will not multiply further.

scepter_desc: Upgrades Tinker's Laser into a Shrink Ray, reducing the main target's size, current health, and maximum health by 13% (stacking). The laser bounces once on the farthest target up to 700 range from the primary one, prioritizing heroes.
shard_desc:
Throws a flare towards an enemy, dealing damage, teleporting them away, rooting them and reducing their Cast and Attack Range for 2 seconds.

 The teleport location is always the ability's current cast range + 100 from Tinker's position when he threw the flare.

scepter_desc: Causes Assassinate to fire quicker and stun the enemy target.
shard_desc: Launches a grenade at the target area, dealing damage to enemies and knocking them and Sniper himself back. Enemies affected are disarmed and have their movement slowed after the knockback.

scepter_desc: Heartstopper Aura's Health Decay is increased by 50% of Necrophos's current health regeneration.
shard_desc: Necrophos turns into a large Death Pulse towards the target unit's position. Once it arrives to the location, the Death Pulse spreads towards nearby enemies and allies.

scepter_desc: Calls 2 Golems.
shard_desc: Increases the power of all imps summoned by Warlock.

scepter_desc:
Attacks from Beastmaster or a nearby unit he controls will cause him bang his drum, dealing damage to nearby units and healing Beastmaster and units under his control for a portion of the damage dealt. Every attack decreases the interval between drum hits down to a minimum of 0.5s between hits after 20 attacks. If no attacks are made, the intervals gradually increase.

Using Primal Roar counts as 10 attacks.
shard_desc: Increases Hawk duration by 5s and summons an additional Hawk.

scepter_desc: Causes Shadow Strike to become a 375 AoE Spell. When Shadow Strike ends or is re-applied to an enemy Hero, the target emits a Scream of Pain, hitting any nearby enemies.
shard_desc: Releases a sonic boom when Queen of Pain blinks, at both her starting and ending locations. Deals 125 damage in a 300 AoE and silences the target for 1.75 seconds.

scepter_desc: Increases base damage per debuff.
shard_desc: If Venomous Gale is dispelled in any way, the target will receive 300 damage and be stunned for 1.6 seconds.

scepter_desc: Applies a Time Lock to all units at the landing destination.
shard_desc: Available for 1.5 seconds after landing Time Walk. If used in this period, you will reverse your time walk back to your previous cast location. Does not affect health or proc scepter hits.

scepter_desc: Reduces cooldown.
shard_desc: Causes Reincarnation to have no mana cost.

scepter_desc: Whenever an enemy is affected by Death Prophet's spells or when she attacks an enemy, a ghost will fly out and hit the enemy for an increased bonus of its usual damage then return to her with life.
shard_desc: Increases Spirit Siphon charges by 1 and causes enemies to be feared for 1.0 seconds if they are siphoned for 3 seconds consecutively.

scepter_desc: Phantom Assassin releases sharp blades around her, dealing a percentage of each victim's max health on impact and applying Break.
shard_desc: Decreases Cooldown. Any time Phantom Assassin gets a hero kill, her ability cooldowns advance 60% of their max cooldown values.

scepter_desc: Reduces cooldown by 3.5s. When targeting an enemy hero, Pugna reduces their outgoing spell damage by 8% per second up to a maximum of 75% and increases his own, up to a maximum of 100%. When draining through a Nether Ward using Shard, the rate of increase/decrease is 4% instead. Debuff lasts 8 seconds.
shard_desc: Life Drain can target your Nether Ward, causing life drain to refract to all enemy heroes within 700 units of the ward for 75% of its normal value. The effect is interrupted if the ward is destroyed.

scepter_desc: CHANNELED - Allows Templar Assassin to teleport to any Psionic Trap after channeling for 2 seconds, detonating it upon arrival as if it was fully charged and instantly dealing 400 bonus damage. Channeling Psionic Projection does not break Meld.
shard_desc: Increases max trap count and trap vision range.  When activated, traps now silence affected enemies.

scepter_desc: Viper slams into the ground, releasing a Nethertoxin and splattering each enemy in a 500 AoE for 4 seconds with the effect of Corrosive Skin.
shard_desc: Increases max stacks, and causes Poison Attack to lower armor per stack and to affect buildings for reduced damage.

scepter_desc: Allows Luna to cast Eclipse on an allied unit or herself and have its effects follow them, or cast it on an area. Increases total beams, reduces duration, removes the limit on beams per unit, and makes the beams appear twice as fast.
shard_desc: Increases collision damage. Glaives rotate 50% faster.

scepter_desc: Increases the level of Dragon Form by adding a Level 4 Black Dragon, that provides free pathing, increases damage, and increases effectiveness of the Wyrm's Wrath attacks.
shard_desc: Ignites an area, dealing damage over time that lingers on enemies in it. Has reduced cast range when melee.

scepter_desc: Shadow Wave can now target and bounce between enemies in addition to allies. When bouncing to an enemy, they will take damage and heal nearby allies equal to 100% of the normal healing and damage values. Dazzle will also perform an attack against any enemy that Shadow Wave bounces to.
shard_desc: Nothl Projection can be cast while Dazzle is disabled. Increases healing done while in the Nothl Realm.

scepter_desc: Supercharges Clockwerks abilities: Battery Assault affects all enemies in its range; Clockwerk's attack speed in Power Cogs is increased; Rocket Flares have a reduced cooldown and fire additional rockets to either side of the target; Hookshot stun radius and duration is increased; Jetpack moves faster. Clockwerk's movement and attack speed becomes slowed to a crawl after the duration runs out.
shard_desc: Clockwerk activates a jetpack, gaining flying movement, flying vision, and bonus movement speed. Clockwerk has a severely-limited turn rate during this time and cannot attack. Jetpack can be toggled on and off for the duration of the buff.

scepter_desc: Causes Leshrac and all nearby enemies to turn ethereal, preventing them from attacking, slowing them, and making them take more magic damage. Increases Leshrac's speed rather than reducing it. Does not cause Leshrac to take amplified damage.
shard_desc: Causes Split Earth to repeat in the same location 2 additional times, with a 5 second delay between each one. Each time the radius increases by 45. Split Earth echo location is visible to both teams.

scepter_desc: Entangles all enemies it hits. Duration scales from 1.5s up to 3.0s seconds at max bounce.
shard_desc: Applies a curse on all enemy heroes within 900 range, displaying them in fog, slowing them, and dealing damage over time based on the number of trees within 250 radius. Treants count as trees for this purpose.

scepter_desc: Increases cast range and reduces cooldown to =20s.  Infest may target enemy heroes for a short duration, attacking them from the inside while increasing Lifestealer's regeneration rate.
shard_desc: Infest explosion applies a 50% duration Open Wounds to enemies in the damage radius.

scepter_desc: Passive ability. Causes Dark Seer's next attack on a hero to have True Strike, knock a replica out of the victim, damaging and stunning them based on how far Dark Seer has moved in the past 3.0 seconds. Max power is reached after 1100 distance moved.
shard_desc: Surged units leave behind a 150 radius trail that lasts 7s, slows enemies around it by 35% and deals 40 damage per second in 0.5s intervals. Can be put on alt-cast to disable the trail.

scepter_desc: Increases Skeleton Archer health.
shard_desc: CHANNELED - Clinkz channels and shoots multiple piercing arrows in the target direction that hit all enemy units dealing a percentage of Clinkz' attack damage and applying attack modifiers.

scepter_desc: Guardian Angel has global cast range, increased radius, and affects buildings. Amplifies health regeneration and incoming heals for the duration.
shard_desc: After a 3s delay, the target is Purified again with 65% effectiveness.

scepter_desc: Enchantress roots an enemy unit. All creeps, ally, enemy and neutral within a radius will gain bonus movement and attack speed and attack the chosen target for 6 seconds.
shard_desc: Leaps backward, dodges incoming projectiles, and launches an Impetus attack on the 2 furthest enemy units within Enchantress' attack range + 100.

scepter_desc: Forces the enemy target to attack Huskar and increases cast range.
shard_desc: Lowers Inner Fire cooldown and causes it to apply a movement speed slow and heal Huskar for a percentage of the damage dealt to enemies.

scepter_desc: Reduces cooldown of Crippling Fear and it becomes a toggled ability that takes a percentage of max mana per second to maintain after the initial duration time.
shard_desc: Hunter in the Night may be cast on a creep, instantly killing it and restoring some of Night Stalker's maximum health and mana. Cannot target ancients during the daytime.

scepter_desc: Broodmother may create up to 5 invisible web lines touching any existing web. Enemy Heroes that cross the web line will spring the trap, becoming rooted, revealed in fog, and take damage over time.  Multiple Heroes can trip on the same line until it's destroyed after being initially triggered.  Broodmother's team is alerted via the minimap when an enemy has triggered the snare.
shard_desc: While Hunger is active, the bonus damage is increased by 4% every 1s.

scepter_desc: Increases cast range and applies Jinada on hit.
shard_desc: Applies Shadow Walk and all of its bonuses to the target ally. Allied fade time is 0.5s. Does not break Bounty Hunter's invisibility when cast.

scepter_desc: Time Lapse may target allied Heroes with 500 cast range. Reduces cooldown.
shard_desc: Shukuchi puts a mark on enemies it damages that last 4.6 seconds. 0.2s after Weaver exits Shukuchi, enemies with a mark within 1200 range will also be attacked with a secondary Geminate attack

scepter_desc: Increases Macropyre duration and causes it to deal Pure damage. Jakiro emits two walls of ice along the edges of the Macropyre that slow any enemies trying to cross them by 60%.
shard_desc: Jakiro's Liquid Frost no longer shares a cooldown with Liquid Fire.

scepter_desc: Flaming Lasso grabs both its target, as well as the target's nearest allied hero within 650 units. The secondary target is tethered to the first.
shard_desc:
Sticky Napalm no longer has a stack limit.

Sticky Napalm deals damage to structures.

scepter_desc: Decreases the cooldown of Hand of God to 110s and it becomes a chanelled spell that lasts for up to =6 seconds. The initial heal happens at the start of the channel, and while channeling other nearby allied units become debuff immune with 60% magic resistance and the power of the heal over time is increased by 200%.
shard_desc: Allows Holy Persuasion to target Ancient creeps. Can control up to 1/2/3 Ancient creeps based on Hand of God's level. Additionally levels up some abilities of creeps by 1 level.

scepter_desc:
The first time Spectre uses Reality on a Haunt illusion, enemies in a =400 area around the target are Feared away from Spectre for =1.5s and have their movement speed slowed by 50%.

Reduces cooldown by 20s.
shard_desc: Dispersion can be activated to increase the amount absorbed and reflected by Dispersion by 50% of its base values for 5s. Cooldown 25. Manacost 50.

scepter_desc: Removes cooldown and reduces manacost by 40%.
shard_desc: Freezes enemies hit with the current level of Cold Feet for 50% of the duration.

scepter_desc: Allies in a 350 radius around the doomed target also suffer the effects of Doom. Allows Doom to be self-cast to affect enemies around himself with Doom. Increases Doom's damage per second.
shard_desc: Heals Doom and his controlled units for 60% of the damage value.

scepter_desc: Reduces cooldown and allows Ursa to use Enrage while disabled.
shard_desc: Earthshock applies 3 Fury Swipes to enemies hit.

scepter_desc: Barathrum gains magic resistance and distorts reality around the selected hero, making any unit-targeted spells cast by enemy heroes get redirected towards Spirit Breaker. Can be cast on both allied and enemy heroes, but only spells cast by enemies of Spirit Breaker will be redirected.
shard_desc: Increases Charge of Darkness Bonus Speed by 85.

scepter_desc: Adds a Side Gunner that at random attacks enemy units near Gyrocopter. When Flak Cannon is active, side gunner attacks 2 units instead. Prioritizes furthest unit away within its range.
shard_desc: Homing Missiles now constantly fires the current level of Rocket Barrage in a 700 area of effect after 1.0 second of being cast. This Rocket Barrage prioritizes the Homing Missile target.

scepter_desc: Alchemist melts down Aghanim's Scepter to grant an allied hero all Aghanim's Scepter upgrades. Alchemist will gain 25 bonus damage for each gifted Scepter.
shard_desc:
Alchemist throws a potion at an ally, applying a basic dispel and giving them attack speed, movement speed and HP regen.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

scepter_desc: Grants 1 current and max level.
Global Silence applies Arcane Curse to heroes for the duration of Global Silence.
shard_desc: Increases the Intelligence stolen per kill.

scepter_desc: Damage that would bring Outworld Destroyer below 20% health triggers a strong dispel. In addition, when the effect is triggered Outworld Destroyer consumes of all his mana to create an all damage barrier equal to 65% of his maximum mana that lasts for 15 seconds. This effect can occur every 80 seconds and cannot be refreshed.
shard_desc: Astral Imprisonment now deals damage in an area. Also allows allies to move at 70% movement speed during Astral Imprisonment (they are visible, but untargettable and can't perform any other actions).

scepter_desc: Lycan bites an allied hero or creep-hero, granting them Shapeshift properties. Lycan and the bitten target gain 40% Lifesteal and share the healing effect of Lifesteal with each other as long as they are within 1200 range of each other.
shard_desc: Causes one of your creep waves to include one uncontrollable wolf that moves with the wave. Additionally, wolves spawned this way may Cripple towers.

scepter_desc:
Primal Split gains 1 max and current level, improving the Brewlings and their abilities.

Allows Primal Split to be cancelled early, and causes the Brewlings to be Brewed Up when Primal Split begins.
shard_desc:
Toss a strong drink to a teammate or drink it yourself, activating the maximum power effect of Liquid Courage and granting 2% Max HP Regen per second.

Lasts 5 seconds.

scepter_desc: Causes Demonic Purge to break and gain 2 charges.
shard_desc:
Cleanses the target allied unit, removing negative buffs for the duration.  At the end of the duration, the unit is healed. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Cleanse.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

scepter_desc: Entangle applies %hits_required% stacks to enemy heroes in the area and has increased radius. Enemies no longer have protection from gaining stacks while Entangled.
shard_desc:
Applies a basic dispel and grants allies in an area around the caster bonus movement and attack speed. Replicates between Lone Druid and Spirit Bear regardless of castability on the other.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

scepter_desc: Creates an illusion of allied heroes globally. Creates an additional illusion for Chaos Knight as well.
shard_desc: Causes Chaos Bolt to create a Phantasm illusion to attack the target. This illusion deals =15% less damage.

scepter_desc: In MegaMeepo form, Meepo flings the topmost meepo towards a target within a %AbilityCastRange% range, dealing damage and slowing their movement speed.
shard_desc:
Digs into the ground for a short duration, dispelling Meepo and causing him to become invulnerable and untargetable for 3s. Restores 25% of his max health over that duration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

scepter_desc: Decreases Cooldown to 80 seconds. When casting Overgrowth, Treant Protector draws power from the soil, gaining an undispellable buff that greatly increasing his size for 16 seconds. While enlarged, he gains phased movement with a fixed speed of 345, 100% bonus Strength, and a splashing attack that deals 60% of his attack damage in a 300 unit radius.
shard_desc: Treant Protector enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location. The eyes last for 300 seconds and are invisible, but are destroyed if their host tree is destroyed or if they are attacked directly.

scepter_desc: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing 150 + 1.5x Ogre's Strength in damage and stunning the target. Its mana cost is 35% of Ogre Magi's current mana.
shard_desc: Creates a shield around the target ally, absorbing a percentage of the damage of next 3 attacks from enemy heroes. When damage is absorbed, a fireball is launched at the attacker. Can be cast on towers.

scepter_desc: Increases strength steal.
shard_desc: Tombstone can be cast on an allied hero to bunker inside of the tombstone. Heroes that enter the Tombstone cannot leave for 2 seconds nor can they re-enter after leaving. If the tombstone is destroyed with a hero inside, that hero gets stunned for 2 seconds.

scepter_desc: Increases the number of spells that can be stolen to 2. Increases cast range, and upgrades spells to their Scepter version.
shard_desc: Allows you to target yourself or allies with Telekinesis. Throw range is 35% longer and throw delay is reduced to 0.5 seconds.

scepter_desc: Mutes items.
shard_desc: Increases the cast range and strike count of Thunder Strike. It can now also be ground targeted, where it will lie dormant for up to 4 seconds and attach to the first enemy that comes within the radius.

scepter_desc: Nyx Assassin buries himself beneath the battlefield over a short duration. Once burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast, the range of Mind Flare and Impale is increased, and Impale's cooldown is decreased. While burrowed, Nyx Assassin is stationary, unable to attack, and invisible. Nyx Assassin gains damage reduction from all damage sources.
shard_desc: Vendetta applies Break on attack.

scepter_desc: Increases cast range and projectile speed.  Allows Ensnare to target and affect Debuff Immune units. Ensnare applies Break.
shard_desc: Increases Song of the Siren's regen and adds mana regeneration for allies.

scepter_desc: Summons Ignis Fatuus at the targeted area. Alternates on and off, drawing enemies closer with its mesmerising flicker.
shard_desc: Increases illuminate heal.

scepter_desc: Spirits now passively spawn around Io constantly every second up to the max. Spirits colliding with enemy Heroes slows them briefly. Can be activated to explode spirits.
shard_desc: Tether damages enemies touching it. Io is healed for 50% of the damage done.

scepter_desc: Turns Visage and familiars invisible, granting Visage bonus movement speed and upgrading its movement type to flying. When Visage or its familiars leave invisibility they deal more damage for a short duration. Lasts 30 seconds. Invisibility ends when attacking or casting.
shard_desc: Grants Visage the ability to cast Gravekeeper's Cloak. Restores up to 25% of your health.

scepter_desc: Provides charges and increases range.
shard_desc: Creates a cloud at the target location. All allies inside the radius are hidden and affected by Shadow Dance.

scepter_desc: Allows on-hit effects to apply to the secondary attacks from Split Shot. Increases arrow count.
shard_desc: When Medusa is targeted with a spell, a single-target Mystic Snake is sent back towards the enemy that turns them into stone for 1s.

scepter_desc:
Causes Whirling Axes (Melee) to dispel Troll Warlord. Reduces cooldown and mana cost.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
shard_desc: Grants Troll 16% + 3% chance per Fervor stack of firing an additional ranged attack to any unit within its ranged attack range plus =175 when attacking an enemy unit.

scepter_desc: Centaur hitches a cart behind him. While active, Centaur gains the benefit of Stampede for the current level of Stampede, and can cast Hitch a Ride on a target ally.
shard_desc: Causes Double Edge to slow enemy heroes and increase Centaur's strength per hero hit for a short time. Duration refreshes per stack, up to a max of 5 stacks.

scepter_desc: Magnus tosses any enemies in front of him, launching them to his rear. Enemies take damage, spend 0.6 seconds in the air, and are stunned while in the air and an additional amount of time after landing.
shard_desc: Increases range and deals additional damage when skewering enemies into trees or cliffs.

scepter_desc: Reactive Armor can now be activated to get max stacks and 150 damage barrier. Grants Timbersaw 100 + 75 barrier amount per second for each enemy hero within 600 radius of Timbersaw up to a maximum of 800. After 8 seconds, Timbersaw deals damage to every hero within 600 radius equal to 200 + his remaining barrier amount and loses all of his barrier.
shard_desc: Releases a flame in the direction Timbersaw is facing. Applies a debuff that deals damage per second and slows enemy movement speed. Affects buildings for reduced damage.

scepter_desc: Adds active ability to Bristleback. Bristleback rotates towards the targeted direction and, after 0.5s, forcefully ejects 5 sequential Quill Sprays in a tight conical pattern out of his back every 0.4s. Bristleback's facing is locked during this time, he is disarmed, and his speed is reduced by -40%.
shard_desc: Coughs a quill-packed hairball towards the target location. Erupts at the location, hitting enemies with Viscous Nasal Goo stacks and Quill Spray.

scepter_desc: Kicks the closest enemy unit in the drawn direction, stunning, damaging, and slowing them. Also deals damage to all heroes within 250 radius of its landing area. Cooldown is reduced by 50% if kicking a creep.
shard_desc: Increases depth of Ice Shards, and enemies trapped within an ice shard are slowed and take damage per second.

scepter_desc: When Skywrath Mage casts Mystic Flare, another Mystic Flare will be created on the position of a different random target enemy within 500 range of the original target. Heroes will take priority.
shard_desc: When Skywrath Mage casts Arcane Bolt, 3 bolts are created, one aimed at the original target, and two others aimed at random enemies within %extra_bolt_search_radius% range of the original target. Heroes will take priority.

scepter_desc: Increases duration. While Borrowed Time is active, anytime an ally takes more than 550 damage while within Mist Coil's cast range of Abaddon, an individual Mist Coil will automatically fire towards that ally.
shard_desc: 75% of absorbed damage is dealt to nearby enemies.

scepter_desc: Causes Elder Titan to become debuff immune and gain 50% magic resistance for 2 seconds per affected enemy Hero when the spirit returns.
shard_desc: Lowers Cooldown. Echo Stomp may be placed on alt-cast to allow Elder Titan to take the place of the Astral Spirit as it completes its stomp.

scepter_desc: Increases Duel duration.  Legion Commander is debuff immune for the duration of the Duel.
shard_desc: Increases Duel damage by 5 per win. Applies retroactively.

scepter_desc: Increases radius and duration of Minefield Sign. When an enemy hero walks within %trigger_radius% units of a minefield sign, the 1000 units area around the sign will become a minefield for 10 seconds, dealing damage to enemy units any time they move within its area. Minefield Sign is destroyed after this effect ends.
shard_desc: Reactive Tazer can be cast on allies and deals damage on detonation. Also deals damage to any enemy that attacks the affected ally.

scepter_desc: Increases cast range, initial remnant speed, and maximum charges.
shard_desc: If an enemy hero dies near Ember Spirit, a Fire Remnant charge will be replenished.

scepter_desc:
Earth Spirit temporarily enchants a hero, granting them the properties of a Stone Remnant. After a short duration the remnant shatters, releasing the hero and damaging nearby enemies. < br>
Can be cast on Stone Remnants. Has a 5 second cooldown when used that way.
Has a larger cast range when cast on an ally hero.
shard_desc: Decreases cooldown to 10s and increases allied unit cast range and pull speed.

scepter_desc: Summons a Pit of Malice around each of the portals. Reduces cooldown.
shard_desc: Firestorm can be allied targeted. When used that way, the Firestorm follows the hero around.  The wave count is increased, and tick rate / duration time occur more quickly.

scepter_desc: Causes a wave to travel outwards in all directions forcing enemy heroes to become Feared upon impact and dealing damage, and grants Terrorblade Metamorphosis for a short time.
shard_desc: Costs part of Terrorblade's current HP to cast, providing Terrorblade and nearby illusions bonus movement, HP Regen and attack speed. Reflection illusions gain 50% of the bonuses. Can't be cast while in Metamorphosis and Metamorphosis will remove Demon Zeal

scepter_desc: Increases number of attacks to destroy Supernova and allows Phoenix to cast Supernova on an allied hero, bringing both into the sun to be reborn together.
shard_desc: Allows Sun Ray to be cast during Supernova, and slows affected enemies by 10%.

scepter_desc: Causes False Promise to have a 0.15 second fade delay invisibility and grants the ally 30% bonus Spell Damage and 0.25 reduced Base Attack Time.
shard_desc: Brings forth rain to the target area. Enemies standing in the area receive damage and have reduced Heal Amplification. Allies in the area heal and have increased incoming Heal Amplification.

scepter_desc: Causes Arctic Burn to be a toggle ability, draining mana every second when active. Removes limit on number of attacks per target. Increases Winter Wyvern's movement speed.
shard_desc: When Cold Embrace ends, a Splinter Blast goes off at that location, hitting enemies within 1150 range. Reduces cooldown by 4.0 seconds.

scepter_desc: Flux silences when the target is alone, deals more damage, and lasts longer.
shard_desc: When Spark Wraith activates, a secondary Spark Wraith will fuse to the next closest target that deals =80.0% damage. Increases Spark Wraith search radius.

scepter_desc: Spawns a monkey soldier near Monkey King at regular intervals. Soldiers do not spawn while invisible or on trees. Soldiers only attack buildings when Monkey King himself is nearby. Soldiers can now gain Jingu Mastery charges independently.
shard_desc: Boundless Strike applies Primal Spring with 35% of the max channeling duration power to enemies along the staff and at the end of the staff. When Boundless Strike is set to alt-cast, Monkey King leaps to the end of his staff.

scepter_desc: Attacking no longer takes Dark Willow out of Shadow Realm. Each attack still has bonus damage based on the duration of the buff.
shard_desc: Cursed Crown creates 4 brambles in a 175 radius around the target after the counter ends. Triggers even upon dispel. Cursed Crown cooldown reduced by 1.5 seconds.

scepter_desc: Causes Shield Crash to cast a 2-attack Swashbuckle every 90 degrees around your hero that deals 75% damage.
shard_desc: Pangolier curls into an immobile protective ball, gaining debuff immunity, 60% magic resistance, and allowing him to turn. Can be cast during Rolling Thunder to temporarily hit the brakes. Can cast Rolling Thunder and Shield Crash during Roll Up. If enemies attack Pangolier during this, he will roll away from the attacker, applying Rolling Thunder damage/stun if there are enemies in the way.

scepter_desc: Creates an ink illusion of a target enemy hero. Illusion is debuff immune, has 95% magic resistance, and has bonus movement speed and attack damage.
shard_desc:
Ink Swell dispels the allied unit when cast. Causes Ink Swell to deal 40% more damage and heal the target for 40% of the damage Ink Swell deals.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

scepter_desc: Increases arrow speed and movement speed slow.
shard_desc: Tosses a boomerang in an arc. Upon contact, it returns to Hoodwink.  The boomerang will deal damage as it passes through or hits enemies, and apply a debuff that causes affected enemies to be slowed and be more vulnerable to spell damage.

scepter_desc: Causes Resonant Pulse to silence and gain 2 charges.
shard_desc: Creates an additional watcher path that rotates around the remnant.  The remnant now provides True Sight, and no longer triggers on creeps, instead dealing 50% damage to them every second in both paths.

scepter_desc: Mortimer spits out the unit that's in his mouth, causing impact damage and stun in a large area. The glob leaves a pool of firespit based on the current level of Mortimer Kisses, that slows and applies damage over time. Spit Out has a no minimum launch range.
shard_desc: Firesnap cookies become even more potent, healing the target and launching a Mortimer Kiss that does 40% impact damage to the landing destination.

scepter_desc: Creates 4 invulnerable soldiers on both sides of Mars front while Bulwark is toggled on. Soldiers move alongside Mars, dealing his attacks that have bonus damage, knock back and slow approaching enemies. An enemy can only be attacked by one soldier at a time.
shard_desc: Spear of Mars impales up to 2 heroes and leaves a fire trail behind that deals damage over time and slows movement speed.

scepter_desc: Escape Act has 2 charges. When the box pops open, Impalement Art daggers are thrown in all directions, and all enemies in an =225 radius take =300 damage.
shard_desc: Ringmaster shines 3 spotlights that sweep over an area. Enemies in the light have a chance to miss their attacks and are revealed if invisible. Illusions hit by the beam fade away, losing a percentage of their maximum health each second. These effects linger for 0.3 seconds after leaving the light.

scepter_desc: Increases Solar Guardian's heal per pulse. Solar Guardian's aura follows Dawnbreaker for 2s after landing.
shard_desc: Dawnbreaker gains debuff immunity, 50% magic resistance, and free movement during Starbreaker. Dawnbreaker is slowed by 35% down to a minimum of 215.

scepter_desc:
Reduces Unleash cooldown by 10.0 seconds and causes Unleash to apply a basic dispel on Marci. While Unleash is Active, all of Marci's abilities unleash pulses when cast. All of Marci's unleash pulses will silence units for 1 seconds.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
shard_desc: Increases damage. Rebound can be cast on enemies, and causes Marci to also get the speed boost when she casts it.

scepter_desc: When Primal Beast activates Uproar, he releases 3 waves of 2 projectiles per stack of uproar each in a circle around him. Projectiles deal damage and Break enemies hit. After a short delay, each projectile splinters in two.
shard_desc:
Primal Beast throws a rock at the target location that stuns and damages enemies. The rock cannot be thrown within a minimum range of Primal Beast. After landing, the rock splits into 3 additional fragments that land behind the initial target location.

 Rock Throw increases stacks of Uproar for each hero hit.

scepter_desc: Dead Shot damage is increased. Dead Shot expands after it ricochets and pierces through enemy heroes as it fears them.
shard_desc:
Muerta gains 30% Spell Lifesteal during Pierce the Veil.
While Pierce the Veil is active Muerta permanently gains 2% spell amplification each time she kills an enemy Hero or they die in her vicinity. Bonus applies retroactively.

scepter_desc:
Casting a weapon ability that would set its alternate weapon ability on cooldown does not do so if it's the first one used within 3 seconds after casting Switch Discipline.

Casting any weapon ability refreshes the cooldown of Switch Discipline.
shard_desc: Kez lifesteals 100% from the impale. If the impale comes from behind the target, the target is stunned. Increases max burst stacks.

scepter_desc: Largo can play two songs per beat by strumming both at the same time. On beats when he strums two songs, Largo deals 50 + 10 +15 +20 magic damage per Groovin' stack to nearby enemies.
shard_desc:
Whenever Largo applies a Unit Target buff to a friendly hero, he also gets the buff.

If Largo targets himself, the buff is also applied to the nearest allied hero within the cast range of the targeted ability.
